name: Holland Mark
description: Holland-Mark is on a mission to create brands people love, clients who love us and a team that loves working together. We bring together competencies in brand positioning strategy, creative design and marketing communications to help our clients build meaningful brands. We focus on clients to whom we are a strategic partner rather than a vendor, in a range of categories including consumer brands, high-growth start-ups not-for-profit institutions and business-to-business marketers.
